title: Vendetta
description: When a beloved prosecutor is shot in broad daylight steps from his office, his colleagues wonder who could be next. Andrea Canning has chosen this episode as one of her most memorable classic episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
